column4: Hi, im new to ubuntu/linux, im installing ubuntu on my notebook using virtualbox and right know im using wireless, it is going to be a problem or i need to configure something if i want to access internet not wireless but with cable conencted?
Ubuntu in the VM won't even know about the wireless, it will get it's network info from VirtualBox
- > thanks, what aboout if i install it on a normal computer?
